articles.title: Dark Stars: The First Stars in the Universe Could Have Been Powered by Annihilating Dark Matter - Universe Today
articles.description: In the early days of the cosmos there may have been pockets of dark matter with high enough density that they formed "dark stars."
articles.content: Dark matter doesnt really do much of anything in the present-day universe. But in the early days of the cosmos there may have been pockets of dark matter with high enough density that they provided a… [+3375 chars]
